
```{r setup, message=FALSE}
library(targets)
tar_config_set(script = "_targets.R")

if (!tar_exist_objects()) {
  message("Targets not built – running tar_make() now (≈ 3-5 min)…")
  tar_make()
}

# pull objects
eval_tbl   <- tar_read(eval_tbl)
glm_map    <- tar_read(pred_map_glm)
rf_map     <- tar_read(pred_map_rf)
```
